apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendition of a couple with a heart, featuring two women with medium-light and medium-dark skin tones, is a beautiful and inclusive representation of love on Apple devices. The emoji is bathed in soft, realistic lighting, highlighting the smooth gradients and rounded forms of the couple, with a prominent, glossy heart nestled between them. On Apple devices, this emoji beautifully symbolizes romantic commitment, deep affection, and a strong bond between women of different complexions, celebrating diverse relationships.
